description:
HelioPower is a UK based company that invests its funds in many different solar projects and it also
provides solutions to the problems what world is facing now for energy and sustainability
As long as there is sunshine, solar energy never runs out. for the coming future, people will reduce
use of petrol/ diesel vehicles and shifts to electric vehicles. We also know about ElonMusk's Tesla
Solar City. In this way in our future, we humans will be going to depend on solar energy. So there is
a great scope for solar projects. So what HelioPower is going to do is to fund solar energy projects,
invest in solar energy companies, and trade with solar energy stocks and provides solutions to many
globals problems what not ,we do endless things by using solar energy and blockchain
name: HELIO POWER TOKEN
